      • countLines

        public java.util.Map<java.io.File,java.lang.Integer> countLines(java.io.File directory,
                                                                java.lang.String fileSelectionPattern,
                                                                boolean recursive)
        Description copied from interface: ILineCounter
        Count the number of lines in files whose names match a given pattern.
        Specified by:
        countLines in interface ILineCounter
        Parameters:
        directory - The base directory to look at files from
        fileSelectionPattern - Pattern for selecting file names
        recursive - Recursively search through directories
        Returns:
        A Map containing files whose lines were counted. Each file is mapped to an integer which is the number of lines counted in the file.
